Band of Sizzling Thunder.desc: When the wearer uses their Skill, increases the wearer's ATK by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> for <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> turn(s).

Belobog of the Architects.desc: Increases the wearer's DEF by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. When the wearer's Effect Hit Rate is <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> or higher, the wearer gains an extra <nobr>#3[i]%</nobr> DEF.

Celestial Differentiator.desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. When the wearer's current CRIT DMG reaches <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> or higher, after entering battle, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by <nobr>#3[i]%</nobr> until the end of their first attack.

Champion of Streetwise Boxing.desc: After the wearer attacks or is hit, their ATK increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> for the rest of the battle. This effect can stack up to <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> time(s).

Eagle of Twilight Line.desc: After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.

Firesmith of Lava-Forging.desc: Increases the wearer's Skill DMG by #1[i]%. After unleashing Ultimate, increases the wearer's Fire DMG by #2[i]% for the next attack.

Fleet of the Ageless.desc: Increases the wearer's Max HP by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. When the wearer's SPD reaches <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> or higher, all allies' ATK increases by <nobr>#3[i]%</nobr>.

Genius of Brilliant Stars.desc: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores #1[i]% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores #2[i]% DEF.

Guard of Wuthering Snow.desc: At the beginning of the turn, if the wearer's HP is equal to or less than <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>, restores HP equal to <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> of their Max HP and regenerates <nobr>#3[i]</nobr> Energy.

Hunter of Glacial Forest.desc: After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> for <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> turn(s).

Inert Salsotto.desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> or higher, the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack DMG increases by <nobr>#3[i]%</nobr>.

Knight of Purity Palace.desc: Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield created by the wearer by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.

Musketeer of Wild Wheat.desc: The wearer's SPD increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> and Basic ATK DMG increases by <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr>.

Pan-Galactic Commercial Enterprise.desc: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. Meanwhile, the wearer's ATK increases by an amount that is equal to <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> of the current Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum of <nobr>#3[i]%</nobr>.

Passerby of Wandering Cloud.desc: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 1 Skill Point.

Space Sealing Station.desc: Increases the wearer's ATK by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. When the wearer's SPD reaches <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> or higher, the wearer's ATK increases by an extra <nobr>#3[i]%</nobr>.

Sprightly Vonwacq.desc: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. When the wearer's SPD reaches <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by <nobr>#3[i]%</nobr> immediately upon entering battle.

Talia: Kingdom of Banditry.desc: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. When the wearer's SPD reaches <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> or higher, the wearer's Break effect increases by an extra <nobr>#3[i]%</nobr>.

Thief of Shooting Meteor.desc: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, regenerates <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> Energy.

Wastelander of Banditry Desert.desc: When attacking debuffed enemies, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>, and their CRIT DMG increases by <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> against Imprisoned enemies.
